mapper.select: select participate_project_id, project_id, tutor_id, mainwork, participate_starttime, participate_endtime, participate_approvestatus, participate_approvetime, costequivalent, isdirector from software.participate_project where participate_project_id = #{participateProjectId}

select participate_project_id, project_id, tutor_id, mainwork, participate_starttime, participate_endtime, participate_approvestatus, participate_approvetime, costequivalent, isdirector from software.participate_project limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into software.participate_project(participate_project_id,project_id, tutor_id, mainwork, participate_starttime, participate_endtime, participate_approvestatus, participate_approvetime, costequivalent, isdirector) values (#{participateProjectId},#{projectId}, #{tutorId}, #{mainwork}, #{participateStarttime}, #{participateEndtime}, #{participateApprovestatus}, #{participateApprovetime}, #{costequivalent}, #{isdirector})

insert into software.participate_project(project_id, tutor_id, mainwork, participate_starttime, participate_endtime, participate_approvestatus, participate_approvetime, costequivalent, isdirector) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.tutorId}, #{entity.mainwork}, #{entity.participateStarttime}, #{entity.participateEndtime}, #{entity.participateApprovestatus}, #{entity.participateApprovetime}, #{entity.costequivalent}, #{entity.isdirector})

insert into software.participate_project(project_id, tutor_id, mainwork, participate_starttime, participate_endtime, participate_approvestatus, participate_approvetime, costequivalent, isdirector) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.tutorId}, #{entity.mainwork}, #{entity.participateStarttime}, #{entity.participateEndtime}, #{entity.participateApprovestatus}, #{entity.participateApprovetime}, #{entity.costequivalent}, #{entity.isdirector})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id) , tutor_id = values(tutor_id) , mainwork = values(mainwork) , participate_starttime = values(participate_starttime) , participate_endtime = values(participate_endtime) , participate_approvestatus = values(participate_approvestatus) , participate_approvetime = values(participate_approvetime) , costequivalent = values(costequivalent) , isdirector = values(isdirector)
mapper.update:
update software.participate_project
project_id = #{projectId},
tutor_id = #{tutorId},
mainwork = #{mainwork},
participate_starttime = #{participateStarttime},
participate_endtime = #{participateEndtime},
participate_approvestatus = #{participateApprovestatus},
participate_approvetime = #{participateApprovetime},
costequivalent = #{costequivalent},
isdirector = #{isdirector},
where participate_project_id = #{participateProjectId}
